title: Home Sweet Hotel: Why Celino Hotel is Your Home Away From Home
seo_title: Home Sweet Hotel: Why Celino Hotel is Your Home Away From Home
more_content:
At Celino Hotel, we strive to provide more than just a hotel room. Settle in, take in the rich history of Celino Hotel, and lounge in style like old Hollywood’s elite. We invite our guests to ease the stress of travel by feeling comfortable and connected. Feel the difference at Celino, your home away from home.

Deep Sleep

Enjoy the suite life at Celino with our spacious loft-style layouts. Our 132 Art Deco inspired guestrooms boast contemporary modern accents, tropical elegance, and an all-natural fresh and inviting setting. Feel at home with our signature finishes like white washed oak hardwood floors, European-style washrooms, hand-tufted New Zealand wool rugs, and locally produced artworks. Thoughtfully designed to invoke a tranquil beach bungalow, our rooms create a sophisticated yet warm and simple style resonating with South Beach living. Our goal is to help you vacation in ultimate luxury, while having all the comforts of home.

[10 Things to Do with Your Family at Celino Hotel]

Eat Well

Visit one of our on-site eateries to savor the exquisite talents of Celino’s chefs and expert mixologists. Grab a cocktail from The Bar at Dalia’s sleek indoor/outdoor horseshoe bar and lounge amidst the surreal flamingo murals. Visit Dalia from 7 a.m. to midnight for wood-fired fare, esoteric wines, and classic Mediterranean plates with a SoBe twist. Book a table for two at Pubblica, our premier Italian eatery that mixes authentic cuisine with locally sourced ingredients in a casual dining room. Enjoy handmade artisanal breads, pastas, and rich flavors in a bright and contemporary setting. Make a reservation for the family or stay cozy in your guestroom with our in-room delivery service.

Stay Fit

A trip to South Beach doesn’t mean you have to sacrifice your home fitness routine. Celino makes it easy to stay on track. Spend the day at our Oasis Garden Pool, tucked into Celino’s lush garden courtyard. The 40-foot pool is the perfect place to stretch out, take a few laps, or just enjoy a calm, meditative space. Take your workout to the beach. We have the perfect beach workouts to get you started - no equipment necessary.

Go for a walk outside. Explore the Celino District, South Beach’s hottest new district in the center of premier shopping, dining, and entertainment. Get to know Ocean Drive, South Beach’s most iconic street, with a palm-lined stroll around colorful Art Deco buildings. Head to the southernmost point of Miami Beach. The 15 minute walk to South Pointe Park provides beautiful views, green open spaces, and plenty of places to sit and watch the boats in busy Biscayne Bay.

[Discover the New Celino District]

Treat Yourself

Named one of “The 12 Best-Designed Hotels Opening this Year” by Architectural Digest, the Celino Hotel pays tribute to Miami’s glamorous 1940s past and Cuban modernism while creating our signature ‘Floridita’ style. Celino brings the historic space into the future with tropical elements, a peekaboo rooftop pool, and a beautiful atrium mural by Los Angeles-based street artist, Mr. Brainwash. We invite you to treat yourself on your South Beach getaway to all that Celino has to offer.

Celino aims to deliver an experience outside the ordinary, by providing a true home away from home - with exceptional perks! Follow the Celino Instagram and post a photo using #BeSeenCelino to show us what you get up to in the new Celino District.

Get to your exciting plans faster when you book with Celino South Beach. Be amongst the first to visit the brand new Celino District when you book our exclusive pre-opening promotion. Receive 20% off our Best Available Rate and a daily breakfast credit when you book now with Celino Hotel.
